body.p: After a brief hiatus for Black Hat / DEFCON, it’s silisec time again!
This month we’ll meet up at Pedro’s Restaurant & Cantina near Great America, off the 101. Looking forward to seeing you Tuesday September 1st, starting around 7pm!

This week brings a new silisec meetup in Mountain View, at Tied House Café and Brewery, a few blocks west from the Caltrain station. Look for your secpals sliding into inebriation Thursday July 9th, starting around 7pm!

Of course silisec is not the only Citysec meetup in the San Francisco Bay Area, nor even the first. In fact, silisec got its start through folks who just couldn’t get enough of Baysec. Check out the next Baysec meetup at Kate O’Briens in downtown San Francisco!
The next silisec meetup is June 3rd starting 6:30pm at St John’s Bar & Grill in Sunnyvale. See you there!
The next silisec meetup is May 6 starting 6:30pm at The Duke in Cupertino. See you there!
We are happy to announce silisec, a CitySec meetup for Silicon Valley! Catch up with friends and colleagues, meet new folks, talk security shop, swap ideas, and drink beer.
Don’t forget to also check out BaySec in the City.
